localize.text: Good day! Would you like to expand the Control team?
You're supposed to expand a team every day. Do you want to unlock the Control Team and continue?
Would you like to expand the Information team and continue?
I am in charge of the Information Team. Would you like to open the team before starting the day?
Are you sure you want to expand the Security Team before starting the day?
I am in charge of the Security Team. Would you like to unlock the team today?
Would you like to expand the Training Team first? It would be helpful for you to manage the workforce.
Hello, I am in charge of the Training Team. Would you like to unlock the team now?
Are you going to expand the Central Command team?
We are in charge of the Central Command team. Are you want to expand the Central Command team?
Expand the Disciplinary team and wanna go to the management department? If you do, let's do it.
I am in charge of Disciplinary team. Are you want to expand disciplinary team before continuing?
Are you going to expand the Welfare team? If you are busy, please try to be smooth.
I am in charge of the Welfare team. Are you want to expand the welfare team?
Will you open the extraction team?
Nice to meet you. I'm in charge of the Extraction Team. We'll see again.
Do you want to open the recording team?
Good morning. This is the recording team. We are record and control everything.
